entry.title: FLASH FREEZE WARNING , Mauricie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:58 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: A few rain showers or flurries. High plus 4.
entry.summary: A few rain showers or flurries ending late this afternoon then clearing. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 this afternoon. High plus 4. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Light snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon then light snow. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h near noon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023
